title: Nebulox
author: Nebulox
content: Hi, Bitcoin Talk community,We're a team of fintech professionals seeking to offer innovative solutions by utilizing cryptocurrencies for business owners. With that, the goal here is to develop an ideal cryptocurrency payment gateway to stand out above the rest by offering clever solutions that could truly improve upon the conventional model. We'd appreciate it if you could help us with our crypto gateway project by providing some feedback on the following questions. - In your opinion, how much does an ideal crypto payment gateway charge on each transaction? - is it okay if the fees vary based on the currency at hand?- which cryptocurrencies should they support?- what are some of the features you want to have in your ideal payment gateway?
